message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a very competitive price. I'm looking for $200.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer the product to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe the product could be priced lower. I am proposing a final offer of $160 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $160. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'll offer the product to you for $170.
Thank you for your offer. I am willing to consider $165 as my final price for the product.
I'm glad we're close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $165. I'll meet you at $175, and that's my final offer.
